library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(psych)


BLS_county_employment_v4 <- read_csv("Documents/Coding Projects/quant_capstone/data_clean/BLS_county_employment_clean.csv")


# Descriptive Statistics

str(BLS_county_employment_v4)


## Number of states

with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(state)))

with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(state[treatment == '1'])))

with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(state[treatment == '0'])))

## Number of counties

### total
with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(FIPS)))

### treatment
with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(FIPS[treatment == '1'])))

### control
with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(FIPS[treatment == '0'])))


with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(unique(FIPS[treatment == '0' | treatment =='1'])))


## Number of observations (March 2021 to Oct 2023)

with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(Unemployment_Rate[date > '2021-03-01']))

### control
with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(Unemployment_Rate[date > '2021-03-01' & treatment == '0']))

### treatment
with(BLS_county_employment_v4, length(Unemployment_Rate[date > '2021-03-01' & treatment == '1']))
